lines.text:
[sitting in the garage with Mike's trashed Falcon]
Gimme a go, Mike... let me fix your car for you.

[knowing he can't afford to pay Rebel]
Mmm, couldn't do that, mate.
No, I mean really fix it... make her fly! She's a 351, right? I've got some nitrous oxide injection 'round that's a sweet sensation.
Ay? Sounds like she's got a wobble in the bottom end.

[Mike's trying to drive the '57 Chev, but not very well]
You're puttin' on the agony, mate, but you're missin' all the style!
